messageBody:
Hi there,
I'm trying to use HTTPUnit to setup some client side tests. In particular I want to use it to test
the presence/absence of certain elements on the page. Since HTTPUnit can do only about 80% of what
I want to do, I wanted to combine the "getDOM" method that exists with the Xalan XPathAPI, and use
XPath expressions to test for the presence of certain page elements.

However it seems that while the API doc says that WebResponse.getDOM() says it returns a
org.w3c.dom.Document, it seems to be returning org.w3c.tidy.DOMDocumentImpl which does not seem to
fully implment DOM 2 functions like getLocalName() (I always get null for eg).

Has anyone had any luck with a) thi type of approach b) know what's going on with the above c)
suggest an alternative?

Thanks in advance!

C Ya,

Peter McEvoy
Senior Technical Analyst
IONA Technologies
